overview: Tyler is convinced by his girlfriend Sarah to take her on a camping trip with Tyler's stepfather and stepbrother Chase to try and renew the familial bonds. With tensions already running high between the estranged stepbrothers, the feuding is exacerbated by unusual sounds and strange news reports. Gun-toting subversives stumble across the campsite and take out their ag... Read all  Director Nicholas J. Hagen Writers Nicholas J. HagenRyan Deal(story) Stars Ryan DealRyan CartyHannah Kaiser
title: Dark Horizon
